did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: This collection includes 90 letters, written by Horatio Nelson Fish, Jr of the 21st Connecticut Infantry Regiment.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Mystic River Historical Society.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], , [Box no]., Mystic River Historical Society

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Horatio Nelson Fish, Jr., was born August 29th, 1843, the son of Horatio Nelson Fish and Lydia Morgan. He enlisted July 5, 1862 in the 21st Connecticut Regiment, Company C Infantry Volunteers at the age of 18, and was mustered-in on September 5, 1862 at the age of 19. He served with the 21st Connecticut Regiment until his death, August 8, 1864, resulting from wounds received July 18, 1864 at Petersburg, VA.
